index.title: How to load PDFs in Unreal Engine
index.description: Documentation for the most popular PDF Viewer plugin for Unreal Engine. Load and show PDFs in Unreal Engine in 2D or 3D.
index.keywords: Firebase, PDF, integration, load pdf, Unreal Engine, game dev, Game Development, Mobile Game Development, Game Development Tools, Mobile Game Development Tools

world.title: How to show PDFs in 3D in Unreal Engine
world.description: Learn how to load and show PDF documents inside an Unreal Engine project. Follow the step-by-step instructions and code examples to help you visualize and interact with 2D PDFs within immersive 3D environments.
world.keywords: Firebase, PDF, integration, load pdf, Unreal Engine, game dev, Game Development, Mobile Game Development, Game Development Tools, Mobile Game Development Tools
